sentences.sContent: The service pedigree helps to determine the importance of the service in context of all the services provided.
sentences.sContent_eng: The service pedigree helps to determine the importance of the service in context of all the services provided.
sentences.sCn: 服务家谱可帮助确定服务在所提供的所有服务的上下文中的重要性。

sentences.sContent: This chart, also known as a pedigree, lists members of each generation of your biological family, with all available health and disease information.
sentences.sContent_eng: This chart, also known as a pedigree, lists members of each generation of your biological family, with all available health and disease information.
sentences.sCn: 这份家谱关系图会列举出你这个家庭每一代所拥有成员，并附加有成员所有已知的健康和疾病信息。

words.tran: 建立纯种系谱而繁育（pedigree的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: the parents and other past family members of an animal or person, or an official written record of this
